citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) -A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process
at 12:50 pm on 04/21/2016. Outside door leading to the facility was closed and locked. Inspector knocked on the
door with no response. Left a business card on the door with contact information and departed the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
Section 2.126(b) -A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process
at 12:50 pm on 04/21/2016.  Outside door leading to the facility was closed and locked.  Inspector knocked on the
door with no response.  Left a business card on the door with contact information and departed the facility.
